LanguageData.Ammo_145x114mm_FMJ.label: 14.5x114mm cartridge (FMJ)
LanguageData.Ammo_145x114mm_FMJ.description: Old-school anti-tank cartridge originally designed for AT rifles, it is also used by a number of heavy machine guns.
